statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT interaction_type, message FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT interaction_id, message, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%complaint%'
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email'
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_type, message FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 2 AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type IN ('Call', 'Meeting') ORDER BY customer_id ASC, interaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS num_interactions FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(interaction_id) > 5
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT MAX(interaction_date) AS latest_interaction_date FROM interactions;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM interactions;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id FROM communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND communication_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('Call', 'Meeting') AND customer_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT communication_id, communication_type, communication_date FROM communications WHERE communication_type = 'Call' AND communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_details FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 456 AND interaction_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT communication_date, communication_type, communication_content FROM communications ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2021-01-01' AND interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_type, com.communication_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id INNER JOIN communications com ON i.interaction_id = com.interaction_id WHERE c.customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT customer_name, feedback_rating FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_rating, feedback_comments FROM feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;

SELECT customer_name, communication_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id JOIN communications ON interactions.interaction_id = communications.interaction_id ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT message_id, customer_id, message_content FROM messages WHERE message_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM call_logs WHERE call_duration > 10 ORDER BY call_date LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, message_date, message_content FROM messages WHERE message_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Completed';
